title: Greater Vision Totem Bug?
body:
I've recently bought the {{item:3362}} in some games, and in every one of them the Ward became the Battlecast Ward

I don't own that ward skin
I currently have the Poro Ward skin. Basic Wards, the normal Trinket Ward, and Sightstone Wards all use my skin, but the pink upgrade of the trinket changes it to Battlecast

I'm attaching an screenshot where I place a Sightstone ward (Poro) on the left, and use the {{item:3362}}  ward on the right
(note the items in my inventory)

replies.body: This is a known issue and we're working on a fix! Thanks for the report!
